data.name: Pinstripe Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Thomas Brush's Original Soundtrack for Pinstripe features over 25 beautiful tracks written specifically for the haunting landscapes of Hell.

MP3 files are placed in the following directory:
[STEAM INSTALL DIRECTORY]/steamapps/common/Pinstripe/Soundtrack/

Tracklist:
1. Main Menu
2. The Train
3. Edge Wood
4. Bonafied Class
5. Sexy Face
6. Hello, Father
7. Stupid Looking Douche!
8. The Hangly Pass
9. Jump On Her Butt
10. Sniffing
11. The Last Walk (feat. Miss Burdy Bondette)
12. Bless My Bosomses!
13. The Last Smile (feat. Miss Burdy Bondette)
14. The Sack Chute
15. Pissward Falls
16. Game Over
17. Birdy B
18. Call Me Princle
19. Unprincledented!
20. Red Wash
21. Red Washian Evening
22. The Last Hug (feat. Miss Burdy Bondette)
23. Poor Little Baby
24. Time To Burn, Teddy Boy!
25. Summerfield
26. Summermoon
27. Reprise

Additional Credits

Tracks 10,12, & 20 feature Michael Adamson on electric guitar.

data.short_description: Thomas Brush's Original Soundtrack for Pinstripe, featuring 25 haunting and beautiful tracks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Shader Model 3.0 Compatible (DirectX 9.0c)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.8 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB OpenGL 2.0 Compatible
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 440 GT (1GB) or Radeon HD 6570 (2 GB)
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
